Title: Orders to Kill
Writer: Donald Downes (original story), George St. George (adapted for the screen by), Paul Dehn (screenplay)
Actors: Eddie Albert, Paul Massie, Lillian Gish, James Robertson Justice
Plot: American agent faces an engrossing moral dilemma when he is parachuted into France to eliminate a suspected traitor in the French Resistance.
Awards: Won 3 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 4 nominations.
